channel.title: Chicago War Computers Food Music Irc on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago War Computers Food Music Irc on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: This weekend
item.description: so this weekend was nice. Friday we went to redno and just hung out. the music wasn’t thrilling.. but it was entertaining. a bunch of old house and club music.. always entertaining. I think I even heard nelly.. which is funny. I ended up getting a bit drunk do to the long island ice tea that was purchased for me. The best part about the night was the company.. some of my good new friends and some good old friends were all there.
